projects.title: JPEG Encoder
projects.description:
This project is an image encoder from the PPM to the JPEG format. It was programmed as part of an end-of-year project at Ensimag.

The image goes through all the encoding functions of the JPEG standard (downsampling, DCT, zig-zag, quantization, RLE coding, huffman coding...) while being optimized (loeffler-DCT, pre-calculation of huffman symbols...).

projects.title: SIR Cellular automata
projects.description:
This cellular automata is based on compartmental modeling in epidemiology (SIR type). It divides the population into 3 compartments: Susceptible, Infectious, and Recovered.

It models the propagation of an epidemic (defined by parameters), over time, in a two-dimensional discretized space. The model takes into account the spatial heterogeneity of population density, using density functions or matrices.

It's a Suika-like mobile game coded on Godot. The game features a LAN multiplayer mode for battling friends.

You have to merge fruits until you get a watermelon without them leaving the box.

projects.title: METEOMAN
projects.description:
It's a Godot puzzle game where you control the weather to move your character.

You have to help the character find his legs back in each level, using the different weather events at your disposal.
